title: Roast potatoes with green beans, tomatoes and chickpeas
ingredients: ['300g baby potatoes', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '300g cherry tomatoes', '225g green beans, sliced into bite-size pieces', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '2 teaspoons olive oil, or to taste (optional)', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
